title: Commanding Heights : Ricardo Lagos | on PBS

organizations.name: World Trade Organization
quotes: This is going to be like the discussion in Seattle in the World Trade Organization that, at the end, you know, you have a group of 10 to 15 countries making the discussion on behalf of the different areas of the world.

This is going to be like the discussion in Seattle in the World Trade Organization that, at the end, you know, you have a group of 10 to 15 countries making the discussion on behalf of the different areas of the world.
So even within globalization there's tremendous inequality. I mean, how does it affect a country like Chile? Do you feel left out from the process?
